extensionDesc.message: Controls the display state of Notion's sidebar by identifying which display a window is displayed on.

leftSidebarState.message: State of the left sidebar when Notion is opened

rightSideBarState.message: State of the comments/updates sidebar when Notion is opened

preventSidebarOnHover.message: Prevent the left sidebar from appearing on hover

waitTimeForSidebar.message: Wait time to get sidebar status when Notion is opened
